00019 #ifndef YS_EXCEPTION_H
00020 #define YS_EXCEPTION_H
00021 
00022 #include <exception>
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00031 class YardException : public exception
00032 {
00033  public:
00034     explicit YardException(const string &s) : m_what(s) {}
00035     virtual ~YardException() throw() {}
00036     const char *what() const throw() { return (m_what.c_str()); }
00037     const string &GetWhat() const { return m_what; }
00038     void SetWhat(const string &s) { m_what = s; }
00039 
00040  private:
00041     string m_what;
00042 };
00043 
00048 class YardDBException: public YardException {
00049  public:
00050         
00051     YardDBException(const string& err, const string& sql="", const string& vars="", int code = 0)
00052         :YardException(err), m_sql(sql), m_vars(vars), m_code(code) {}
00053     
00054     virtual ~YardDBException() throw() {}
00055     
00056     const string& GetSQL() const { return m_sql; }
00057     const string& GetVarInfo() const { return m_vars; }
00058     int GetCode() const { return m_code; }
00059  private:
00060     string m_sql;
00061     string m_vars;
00062     int m_code;
00063 };
00064 
00065 class YardDBIntegrityException: public YardDBException {
00066  public:
00067  YardDBIntegrityException(const string& err, const string& sql="", const string& vars="")
00068         :YardDBException(err, sql, vars) {}
00069     
00070     virtual ~YardDBIntegrityException() throw() {}
00071 };
